Characteristics List
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): FAQ: Characteristics List
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, December 5, 2001 - 02:23 pm:

Just thought I would compile a list. I have found myself having to choose in the shrine between monster data with varying characteristics, and thought a chart might be useful.

If you discover an item not in the chart please post it in Misc Q&A
and a moderator will edit this chart and give you credit for the discovery!



CharacteristicDescriptionItem Bestowing
Act. ViewMakes it easier to hit high-speed opponentsEye Drops
ArmorReduces damage but is hard to dodge opponent attacks
Big EaterAllows the monster to eat 2 items per weekHungrFruit
Big LungsIncreases the power of breathing movesSH Fruit
Cold ProofResists IceCold Paint
Cold ResisIncreases resistance against IceJill Beard
Dark AuraResists MindJoker Mask
Dusk AuraRarely is affected by non-physical attackscombined chars
Earth KnowIncreases earth power & accuracy.Earth Orb
Elec-ProofResists Lightning.Elec Paint
Elec ResistIncreases resistance against LightningTiger Horn
Eye CharmIncreases the power of Charming movesRibbon
Fairy KnowIncreases Ice/Fire/Water/Wind/Earth & Lightning powers & accuracycombined chars
Fire KnowIncreases Fire power and accuracyFire Know
Flex TailIncreases power and accuracy of moves that use the tail.Dino Tail
FootworkDodges opponent attacks but gets damaged easilyScarf
Gold GiftMakes it easier to raise all parameterscomined chars
Grace StepIncreases the power of dancing moves & makes it easier to dodgeToe Shoes
Hard HeadIncreases the power of moves that use the headGolem frag
Hard ScaleReduces damage but is hard to dodge opponent attacksScales
Hard ShellReduces damage but is hard to dodge opponent attacks
Hard SkinReduces damage but is hard to dodge opponent attacksBeaclnHorn
HeatproofResists FireHeat Paint
Heat ResistIncreases resistance against FirePhnxFeathr
Hi-PowerMakes it easier to increase the Pow parameter.Larox A
Hi-ResistMental stability makes it resistant to status changesLogimole V
Hi-SenseMakes it easier to increase the Int parameter.Karianin
Hi-SpeedMakes it easier to increase the Spd parameter.Teromean S
Hi-TechMakes it easier to increase the Hit parameterTrokatin X
Hi-ToughMakes it easier to increase the Lif & Toughness parameter.Tapaurin N
Ice KnowIncreases Ice power and accuracyIce Orb
Iron FistIncreases the power of moves that use the fist.Gaboo Soul
Iron HeartTraining hard won't tire the monster outBiasin Z
Life KnowIncreases Life power and accuracyLife Orb
Light AuraResists MagicGali Mask
Loud VoiceIncreases the power of loud voice movesMegaphone
Ltng KnowIncreases Lightning power and accuracyThunder Orb
Magc ResisIncreases resistance against MagicMonol Fragment
Magic KnowIncreases Magic power & accuracyMagic Orb
Mind KnowIncreases Mind power & accuracyMind Orb
Rock SkinReduces damage but is hard to dodge opponent attacks
Sharp BldIncreases the power of moves using weaponsEvil (Wracky's) Knife
Sharp ClawIncreases the power of moves using clawsNail File
Sharp FangIncreases the power of moves using fangsWorm Fang
Sharp HornIncreases the power of moves using hornsAva. Horn
SniperIncreases accuracy when throwing things.Binoculars
Soft BodySoftens damage from opponents
Soft SmellIncreases the power of charming movesPollen
Spec ModsMakes it harder to be affected by Fire Ice Water & Lightningcombined chars
Sweet VoxIncreases the power of singing attacks.Losenges
Water KnowIncreases Wind power & accuracyWater Orb
WaterproofResists WaterWatr Paint
Watr ResisIncreases resistance against WaterZilla Beard
Wind KnowIncreases Wind power & accuracyWind Orb
Wind ResisIncreases resistance against WindMarkisWing
